title: Nicolas Eugui | Portfolio
description: Backend Developer specializing in crafting efficient and scalable solutions for web applications. Explore my projects and reach out to collaborate on exciting development challenges.
name: Nicolas Eugui Bentancor
about: Software Developer specializing in Backend development with a focus on creating efficient and scalable systems. My deep understanding of application architecture enables me to design robust solutions that meet the needs of clients and businesses. Passionate about technical excellence, I am dedicated to continuously improving and optimizing systems. With extensive experience in web development, including individual and collaborative Front-End and Full-Stack projects, I concentrate on building logic to ensure the performance and reliability of applications. I am known for writing clean and efficient code, making it easy to understand and maintain.

projects.title: Snapify - Full-Stack Web Development Project
projects.subtitle: Platform for Photography Contests
projects.description: Snapify is a project where I primarily worked on the backend development aspect alongside a team of three developers. My tasks involved creating strong server-side functions and managing databases efficiently. As a result, we built a user-friendly platform allowing user registration, photo uploads, contest participation, and customization for photography enthusiasts.

projects.title: StarWars Blog Reading List
projects.subtitle: StarWars API Integration and Efficient State Management
projects.description: Project focused on frontend development, utilizing React to consume an external Star Wars API. Implemented two primary views: a list view and an individual item view (e.g., spaceships). Ensured seamless integration with the API, enabling efficient data retrieval and display within the application. Additionally, leveraged the Context API for effective state management following the Model-View-Controller (MVC) design pattern, facilitating storage, visualization, and user interactions.

projects.title: ATC Discord Bot for LiveATC Streams
projects.subtitle: Discord Server with Real-Time ATC Audio Streams
projects.description: Discord bot designed to enrich your server with real-time air traffic control (ATC) audio streams from LiveATC.net. With seamless integration, users can listen to live communications between pilots and air traffic controllers directly within Discord voice channels. Developed with Python and Discord.py, this project showcases my expertise in bot development, API integration, and user experience design. Discover how this unique bot enhances communication and immersion for aviation enthusiasts and communities worldwide.
